name: WorldOs
short_description:
WorldOs is a Custom Ubuntu-Based Distro Built By Juan Kleynhans

WorldOs Is Amazingly Built and A Very Good Looking Distro

WorldOS is a multi-functional operating system designed specifically for  users who wants A Custom Look And Feel  For Linux. It is based on Ubuntu which is the most popular Linux operating system in the world.

WorldOs gives users more flexibility.
It allows you to use WorldOS alongside your current operating system.

Thanks to WorldOs's immunity to Windows viruses you will never have to worry about any of that nasty malware.
With WorldOs you are sure to have peace of mind.

WorldOS is super fast. WorldOs is faster than Windows 7 and Mac because it is more lightweight And Better Looking.

WorldOs Has a Bunch Of Cool App's Including: A custom Built Gnome Gui,Custom Blue Icons,Chromuim Web Browser,Vlc Media Player And Many More.....
summary: WorldOs is a Custom Ubuntu-Based Distro Built By Juan Kleynhans
